sentences.en: And a host of new leaders rose to claim his mantle.
sentences.cn: 于是一批新领导人纷纷起来继承他的衣钵.

sentences.en: I guess we'll have to take your picture down from the mantle.
sentences.cn: 我想我们要把你的照片从壁炉架上取下来.

sentences.en: She blushed deeply, and lifted up a corner of her mantle to her mouth again.
sentences.cn: 她一下子红了脸, 又扯起围巾角挡住了嘴.

sentences.en: She has the intellectual form to take up the mantle of leadership.
sentences.cn: 她具备担当领导职责的聪明才智。

sentences.en: The earth bore a thick green mantle of vegetation.
sentences.cn: 大地覆盖着一层厚厚的绿色植物.

sentences.en: The earth had donned her mantle of brightest green.
sentences.cn: 大地披上了苍翠欲滴的绿色斗篷.

sentences.en: The earth has a core and a mantle around it.
sentences.cn: 地球的中心是地核,地核的周围是地幔.

sentences.en: The light loose mantle was thrown over his tunic.
sentences.cn: 一件轻质宽大的斗蓬披在上衣外面.

sentences.en: The mantle of spinsterhood was definitely on her shoulders now.
sentences.cn: 英迪亚已完全是一副老处女的样子了.

sentences.en: The mesosphere comprises the rest of the mantle below the asthenosphere.
sentences.cn: 中间圈包括岩流圈以下地幔的其余部分.

sentences.en: The parks and squares looked grim under a mantle of soot and ash.
sentences.cn: 在一层烟尘的笼罩之下，公园和广场显得阴沉沉的。

sentences.en: The vice-president must now take on the mantle of supreme power.
sentences.cn: 副总统现在必须承担起最高权力的重任。

sentences.en: The whole city was muffled by this fast - thickening mantle.
sentences.cn: 整个城市都被这场迅速加厚的大雪包裹了起来.

sentences.en: There is a higher heat production in the upper mantle below oceans than below continents.
sentences.cn: 大洋下的上地幔要比大陆下的上地幔有较高的热产率.

sentences.en: We have the rare opportunity to seize the mantle of national leadership.
sentences.cn: 这次是我们担当国家领导职责的天赐良机。
